toggled.description: Whether or not the linter is enabled

logging.description: Log linter messages to the console for debugging

highlight_color.description: Highlight color. You may use css variables here (i.e. var(--jp-error-color3) )

gutter_color.description: Gutter icon color. You may use css variables here (i.e. var(--jp-error-color0) )

conda_env.description: Conda environment to use for flake8 linter

terminal_name.description: Persistent internal terminal name. This is set automatically on each run
